sentences: Josh Roseman (born 5 June 1967) is an American jazz trombonist.
Roseman was born in Boston, and studied at the New England Conservatory of Music.
Roseman toured Jamaica with The Skatalites and in Australia with the Christopher Hale Ensemble.
